description: study of drapery on a standing figure viewed from PL; torso and legs, with feet and lower legs differentiated; arms not differentiated
inscription:

bottom center of mount, in pencil: [Carlo Maratta]; on back of mount, in pencil: [191052] and [453]
medium: Red and white chalk on blue paper
provenance: Sale, Sotheby's, London, July 4, 1975, no. 157, for Â£32, to Moir; Alfred Moir, Santa Barbara (1975-d. 2010; bequeathed to MIA)
title: Drapery Study
